title: Zombies in the Deli
description: When Elaine arrives to work at her deli job she had no idea she would soon be battling zombie co-workers. Corporate greed creates the backdrop for contaminated meat to find its way into the grocery store. Will the infestation be caught in time? What can Elaine do to keep herself from becoming the next victim?This Kindle Short Read takes you on a roller coaster ride behind the scenes in a superstore deli. You'll never look at roast beef the same again!
author: Nicola Strong
